items.content_html: Media Services Application Mapper is a browser-based tool that allows operators to visualize the structure and logical connections among AWS Media Services and supporting services in the cloud. The tool can be used as a top-down resource monitoring tool when integrated with CloudWatch.

The tool can be used as a top-down resource monitoring tool when integrated with CloudWatch.
